content:
CS 175: Project in AI - Winter 2012

Tournament Live Leaderboard

Results shown are the cummulative score over all tournaments run so far. (The linked file changes after each tournament is run.)

Mancala Code

Submitted Players

- Team8 (Updated on 2/29 with a new version)

- AILearning (Note: Be sure to call actionsBeforeDeletion() where necessary. Also requires group10_data.txt in the working directory)

- group1

- Group9RL

They are available in the directory listing as jar files. Be sure you have the latest version of the framework.

Download

Download the Mancala framework code here as an archive, or browse the directory listing for the individual files.

Please let me (the TA) know of any questions about the code.
